extension.name: OAuth
extension.description: An extension to hook oauth2 to http extension connectors.

operation.name: invalidateOauthContext
operation.description: Clears the oauth context for a token manager and a resource owner id.

parameter.name: tokenManager
parameter.description: The token manager which holds the credentials to invalidate.

parameter.name: resourceOwnerId
parameter.description: The resource owner id to invalidate. This attribute is only allowed for authorization code grant type.

operation.name: retrieveAccessToken
operation.description: Returns the access token of the token manager for the parametrized resource owner ID

parameter.name: tokenManager
parameter.description: The token manager which holds the access token.

parameter.name: resourceOwnerId
parameter.description: The resource owner id to invalidate. This attribute is only allowed for authorization code grant type.

parameter.name: outputMimeType
parameter.description: The mime type of the payload that this operation outputs.

parameter.name: target
parameter.description: The name of a variable on which the operation's output will be placed

parameter.name: targetValue
parameter.description: An expression that will be evaluated against the operation's output and the outcome of that expression will be stored in the target variable

operation.name: retrieveCustomTokenResponseParam
operation.description: Returns the value of the parameter that was extracted during the dance from the token manager for the parametrized resource owner ID

parameter.name: tokenManager
parameter.description: The token manager which holds the access token.

parameter.name: resourceOwnerId
parameter.description: The resource owner id to invalidate. This attribute is only allowed for authorization code grant type.

parameter.name: key
parameter.description: to look for in the elements that has been extracted after the previous OAuth dance.

parameter.name: target
parameter.description: The name of a variable on which the operation's output will be placed

parameter.name: targetValue
parameter.description: An expression that will be evaluated against the operation's output and the outcome of that expression will be stored in the target variable

operation.name: retrieveExpiresIn
operation.description: Returns the expiration of the oauth context for the parametrized resource owner ID

parameter.name: tokenManager
parameter.description: The token manager which holds the access token.

parameter.name: resourceOwnerId
parameter.description: The resource owner id to invalidate. This attribute is only allowed for authorization code grant type.

parameter.name: outputMimeType
parameter.description: The mime type of the payload that this operation outputs.

parameter.name: target
parameter.description: The name of a variable on which the operation's output will be placed

parameter.name: targetValue
parameter.description: An expression that will be evaluated against the operation's output and the outcome of that expression will be stored in the target variable

operation.name: retrieveRefreshToken
operation.description: Returns the refresh token of the oauth context for the parametrized resource owner ID

parameter.name: tokenManager
parameter.description: The token manager which holds the refresh token.

parameter.name: resourceOwnerId
parameter.description: The resource owner id to invalidate. This attribute is only allowed for authorization code grant type.

parameter.name: outputMimeType
parameter.description: The mime type of the payload that this operation outputs.

parameter.name: target
parameter.description: The name of a variable on which the operation's output will be placed

parameter.name: targetValue
parameter.description: An expression that will be evaluated against the operation's output and the outcome of that expression will be stored in the target variable

operation.name: retrieveState
operation.description: Returns the state of the oauth context for the parametrized resource owner ID

parameter.name: tokenManager
parameter.description: The token manager which holds the access token.

parameter.name: resourceOwnerId
parameter.description: The resource owner id to invalidate. This attribute is only allowed for authorization code grant type.

parameter.name: outputMimeType
parameter.description: The mime type of the payload that this operation outputs.

parameter.name: target
parameter.description: The name of a variable on which the operation's output will be placed

parameter.name: targetValue
parameter.description: An expression that will be evaluated against the operation's output and the outcome of that expression will be stored in the target variable
